Author: paperclip1213
Text: Everyone has a different reason. Either you have to look deep inside to find out your trigger, or one day it'll just come to you.  After years of on and off binge and restrict phases, I one day realised that I binge because I use food as a "reward". When I feel like life is beating me down I feel like I *deserve* to eat a lot. Like I'm entitled to eating more than I should be allowed.  After realising that, I knew I couldn't go back to restricting the way I used to, but I could find a new normal.  I would suggest you do that - learn the reason you binge and then find a new normal.
